name: Shadowlord
pages: Shadowlords are powerful Shadows that have gained a strong presence in the physical world, though they have retained their immunities to standard weapons. Shadowlords have an Aura of Blindness about them, possess magic and can summon Shadow and Ghoul minions or even a Daemon to do their bidding.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Large$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mini Boss$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Rare$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Levitates$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal/Slow$(br)$(l)Health$(): 50hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 8hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): No$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Underworld, Nether

$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Aura of Blindness surrounds a Shadowlord.$(br)- Can inflict Poison on strike.$(br)- Can Drain health on strike.$(br)- Can cast Harm spell.$(br)- Can summon multiple minions at once including Shadows and Ghouls.$(br)- Has a chance to summon a Daemon.$(br)- Partial immunity against most weapons.$(br)$(l)Weakness$():$(br)- Gold and Shadow weapons.

pages.title: Aura of Blindness
pages.text: $(l)Aura of Blindness$() is a spell that encircles a Shadowlord. If one steps inside the circle, they will be inflicted with the $(l)Blindness$() effect for 2 seconds. The aura appears as smoke particles rising from the ground around the Shadowlord.$(br)You can negate this effect by wearing a $(l)Gold$() helmet.

pages.title: Drain
pages.text: $(l)Drain$() is a spell that drains the health of the target and is added to the caster's health. Shadowlords inflict drain during a strike instead of casting a separate spell.

pages.title: Immunities & Weakness
pages.text: Shadowlords have an immunity to most weapons, reducing their damage to Stone tier. However, all Shadowspawn have a weakness to $(l)Gold$() and $(l)Shadow$() weapons. Gold will do Iron tier damage, a $(l)Shadow Falchion$() will do Diamond tier damage, and a $(l)Shadow Blade$() with do Netherite damage.

pages.title: Shadow Blade
pages.text: Shadowlords carry Shadow Blades and have a good chance of dropping one on death.$(br)$(br)*Shadow Blades cannot be crafted.*
